channel.title: Python on Dilettanting Data Science

item.title: Is it CR7 or Messi?: Using the fastai toolkit
item.description: World Cup Mode: CR vs Messi¶To try to solidify what I have learned from Deep Learning for coders from fast.ai, I'll try to train a computer vision algorithm such that it can recognize whether is Messi or Cristiano Ronaldo in the picture. Notebook in github or nbviewer Imports¶ In [1]: # Put these at the top of every notebook, to get automatic reloading and inline plotting %reload_ext autoreload %autoreload 2 %matplotlib inline In [2]: # This file contains all the main external libs we'll use from fastai.
